text: wjadlh qawmih fi tawhid allah taealaa qal: 'atujadilunani fi twhydy lilah balebadt, waqad wfqny 'iilaa maerifat whdanyth, fa'iina kuntum tkhwfwnny balhtkm 'an tuaqie bi drrana f'inny la arhbha falan tdrny, 'iilaa 'an yasha' rabiy shyyana. wasie rabiy kula shay' elmana. 'afala tatadhakarun ftelmu 'anah wahdah almebwd almsthq llebwdy?
